Html:
I've encountered a problem that I have a base.less in a folder "A" and
I have a sub.less in a folder "B" which is a sub folder of folder A (A
-- > B) and sub.less imports base.less. And also it happens at the mash.chirp.config.

In base.less, I have url(images/logo.jpg) as a variable called @logo-
image. Because I import this in my sub.less, so the generated sub.css
will have the wrong path from the base.


So is it a way to rewrite the path when generating the css file?
make the path absolute instead of relative. Rewriting relative paths to absolute paths automatically is on my todo list.
